Key: The Neo Tengu Tower is almost complete.

Man, it sure looks grand. Who would've
ever thought such a nice building would be
built in Tengu City?

It's so tall that you could spot it anywhere
in town. Truly the icon of Tengu City.
Kurumi...?
What a pleasant coincidence, Shido-san.
...You're like a phantom.
Did you come to look at Neo Tengu Tower?

Y-Yeah, kinda. How about you? Did you come
to check out the new hotspot?

Yes, well... I was rather curious about
something.

Curious...? Wait, don't tell me you're some
kind of industrial spy.
Hehehe. Of course not.

R-Right, thought so. I guess you wouldn't
do that.
Anyways Shido-san, I want to ask you something.
Hm? What is it?
What do you think... about Neo Tengu Tower?

Neo Tengu Tower, huh...? Hm. Everyone's
buzzing in town and at school about how
it's going to be the hottest tourist spot.

Well. I'm sure it'll become the new symbol
of Tengu City, so I don't blame them, but...
But... what?
Well, um...

(Why does my heart feel funny? Almost gross.
Like, strangely uncomfortable.)
You don't have to panic. I won't rush you.
Um...

(But can I even say it...? It's troubling.
I just don't know how to explain it.)
Shido, you can't just gift her information.
K-Kotori...?
Kurumi is a wild card. Be careful. She might\npull something in Neo Tengu Tower. If we mess\nup, it might involve people like last time.
I'm sure it's no coincidence that Kurumi\nshowed up. There has to be a reason.
Then, what do you suggest I do?
Beats me. Just watch what you say in front\nof her, got it?
Okay, got it.
W-Well...
I think this will be Tengu City's pride and joy.
Something's off.

I really think this'll be the pride and joy of
Tengu City. Having such a symbolic landmark
built... is pretty mesmerizing.
...I see.
Sorry. That wasn't too fun of an answer.

No. As a person who lives here, it's only
natural for you to be excited about it.
Y-Yeah.
Thank you for your time. I must be going now.
Oh, Kurumi...
Good day...
What was that all about?
No clue. Let's just say nothing happened.
Sure, I guess...
It's hard to explain, but something feels off.

My, off you say? What ever could you be
feeling?

It's hard to explain, but something about
it looks out of place in this town. As if it
doesn't really belong.
I see. What an intriguing perspective.

I don't know if I'm making sense, but
it came out of nowhere.
Maybe I'm just not used to it yet.
I think that's fine.
Huh...?
Shido-san, don't forget that feeling.
What do you mean?

Who knows? I pray the answer comes to you
on its own.
Huh...?
Well, I'll be off now. Good day, Shido-san.
Kurumi...
Hey, Shido. What are you doing?

S-Sorry. I just can't shake the feeling that
something's off.
I see. If that's how you feel, Shido, then\nit must be true, but that's for you to decide.
Aw.
